message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be highly valuable to you. I'm asking for $13,000.  What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value of the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but I believe the value this product brings to you is much higher than $10,000.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above that. How about we try $11,000? I'm willing to meet you halfway from our original offers.
